Reviews.Title: Greatest phone I've ever owned
Reviews.Author: BG
Reviews.Content: I have had this particular phone for just over 5 years. I got it my freshman year of college and it went EVERYWHERE with me. I have kicked it around the floors of multiple clubs, dropped it on sidewalks, dormroom floors, cement basement floors, everywhere.  This phone is a tank.  Only recently did the hinge begin to not work. The phone still makes calls/texts but if you are holding it open vertically, it will close itself because, from what I am assuming, the spring in the hinge has been unhooked.  The camera on it works really well.  The few cons of this phone are: after a few years it occassionally turns itself off; it doesn't get service in some buildings where other phones will; it uses up battery after about 2-2.5 days and you can't use recordings for ringtones.Overall, I love this phone. The only reason I am looking for a new one is because it doesn't now stay open on it's own.

Reviews.Title: Simple is better...
Reviews.Author: C. Monge Soto "Anime FAN"
Reviews.Content: Some people does not need any complex mobile, I recommend this cell phone for those persons who just need to call, be called and text sometimes.
